Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment

Class DynamicRemoteThemeFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment.DynamicFragment
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment.ThemeFragment<DynamicRemoteTheme>
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment.DynamicRemoteThemeFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentCallbacks, SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.core.view.MenuProvider, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, DynamicLifecycle, DynamicSearchListener, DynamicTransitionListener, ThemeListener<DynamicRemoteTheme>, ThemeListener.Export<DynamicRemoteTheme>, ThemeListener.Import<DynamicRemoteTheme>, ThemeListener.Value
public class DynamicRemoteThemeFragment extends ThemeFragment<DynamicRemoteTheme>
Base theme fragment to provide theme editing functionality.

Extend this fragment to implement theme attributes according to the requirements.

      public void onSetAction(int themeAction, @Nullable ThemePreview<DynamicRemoteTheme> themePreview, boolean enable)
      Description copied from interface: ThemeListener
      This method will be called on setting the action icon.

      It can be used to change the action icon while sharing the theme.

      Parameters:
      themeAction - The theme action to be used.
      themePreview - The theme preview to set the share action.
      enable - true to enable the share action.
